column4: howdy, everytime my screensaver comes on it logs me out. is there a way around that besides never letting my screensaver kick in
do you mean the screensaver when you try to resume brings up a password dialog box? since you can turn that off in the screensaver dialog box
check dmesg or your other logs in /var/log
you have to do it though its init script should be in /etc/init.d
